mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.banji_uuid_number as banjiUuidNumber ,a.nianji_types as nianjiTypes ,a.banji_name as banjiName ,a.banji_address as banjiAddress ,a.banji_content as banjiContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number as laoshiUuidNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail ,laoshi.jinyong_types as jinyongTypes
FROM banji a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and a.banji_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.banjiUuidNumber},'%')
and a.nianji_types = #{params.nianjiTypes}
and a.banji_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.banjiName},'%')
and a.banji_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.banjiAddress},'%')
and a.banji_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.banjiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
and laoshi.jinyong_types = #{params.jinyongTypes}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
